page.title: 14RELIGION IN CHARLTON KINGS
page.content: { }There are 4 churches in the {area}.We wrote to their ministers and summarised their replies. {St.Mary's (C of E). _}Choir(22 adults 18 children),Sunday School (60 children approx.) Bell ringers and Comitas (young peoples group). Average Sunday attendance 375. {Holy Apostles (C of E.) _}Choir (8 adults 8 children),Sunday school ( 30 children ), Youth Group, Growth Group, Brownies, Guides and Mother's union. Average Sunday attendance 100. {Charlton Kings Baptist, _}Sunday school(150 children),Girl's and Boy's Brigade,Games Evenings,a Luncheon Club Inter Youth Group and Coffee Mornings. Average Sunday attendance 200. {Sacred Hearts (RC)._}Choir (10 adults) ,Sunday Instruction classes for children,folk choir.700 people attend. {
